name: Emergent
tagline: Advanced AI app builder that ships full-stack apps
description: World's first agentic AI vibe coding platform that builds full-stack web & mobile apps with English as the programming language. Our multi-agent architecture emulates how a real, high-quality engineering team ships.

name: Flask
tagline: Notion + Loom, for video collaboration.
description: Video collaboration platform built by creatives, for how creatives actually work. Designed and developed solo (no investors, no team)

name: KaneAI
tagline: GenAI-Native Software Testing Agent
description: KaneAI by LambdaTest is the world's first GenAI-Native testing agent for fast-paced Quality Engineering teams. It offers AI-driven test authoring, management, and debugging, enabling users to plan, author and evolve complex test cases using natural language.

name: Waydev AI
tagline: Waydev AI, the ChatGPT for Engineering Intelligence
description: Waydev AI, an AI-native conversational platform designed to transform how engineering leaders measure performance and understand AIâ€™s impact on delivery.

tagline: Blazing fast, AI-powered Video Messaging for teams
description: ðŸš€ ãƒ„Supercut is officially launched. AI-powered video messaging for busy teams. Record and share polished videos instantly with chapters, captions, and summariesâ€”perfect for team updates and customer pitches. ãƒ„Supercut is native for macOs and Windows.

tagline: beautiful component library based on Cal.com's iconic design
description: coss.com - the everything but AI company

name: Chat-Based Editing by Riverside
tagline: Edit your videos and podcasts, just by chatting.
description: Creating content is fun. But editing? Letâ€™s be honest, not always as fun. With chat-based editing, you have a personal AI agent that helps you edit your videos just by chatting, so you can focus on the fun part.

name: Vibe for WordPress by 10Web
tagline: Turning WordPress into a vibe-coding machine
description: Vibe turns the worldâ€™s most powerful CMS into a true full-stack AI-native builder. Unlimited creative freedom powered by AI and WordPress.

name: Loopple 2.0
tagline: Build websites by chatting with AI, but faster and easier
description: Create and launch websites more easily and quickly than ever before. Not a single line of code needed, just generate, customize & go live fast.

name: Rhythm
tagline: Hear, see and feel your own heartbeat
description: Rhythm transforms the new AirPods Pro heart rate sensing feature into one-minute mindful check-ins: feel, see, and hear your actual heartbeat through synchronized audiovisuals, and haptics. Works with AirPods Pro 3, Apple Watch, or any Bluetooth heart monitor.

name: FlashMock
tagline: Ace interviews through practice with peers, AI & coaches
description: FlashMock is the training ground for ambitious professionals to land their dream job. Practice live with peers, AI, and expert coaches. Get tailored feedback, and build real confidence through repetition. Out prepare. Outperform.

name: Aero Hand Open
tagline: An open-source dexterous hand for research and makers
description: Aero Hand Open is a lightweight, open-source tendon-driven robotic hand. Fully 3D-printable and modular, it offers smooth, human-like motion with ESP32 and ROS2 support â€” an accessible platform for research, education, and prototyping.

name: Aidy
tagline: The all-in-one app for living with Crohn's or Colitis
description: Aidy makes it easier to navigate life with Inflammatory Bowel Disease. By untangling the tricky relationships between diet, symptoms, and treatments, Aidy helps people with IBD find and avoid their triggers, share data with doctors, and stay out of the ER.

name: QTR
tagline: A to-do app inspired by Amazonâ€™s "Working Backwards" method
description: QTR is a to-do app inspired by Amazon's "Working Backwards" approachâ€”start with the big picture, work backward to plan your weeks, then time-block your daily tasks. Every action stays aligned with your quarterly goals.

name: Diggy Miner AI Web Scraper
tagline: Get leads and data from any website using AI.
description: Diggy Miner is an AI-powered web scraper that lets you extract unlimited leads, emails, eCommerce insights, product reviews and business data from any website. With no complications. No coding requiredâ€”just simple, adaptive scraping right from your browser.

name: SnapLearn
tagline: An AI Tutor to make learning fast and fun.
description: SnapLearn is your personal AI tutor that turns your study materials into interactive notes with visuals, mind maps, flowcharts, and audio podcasts.Also, you can chat with your tutor and take personalised tests to master every concept.

name: TRYGO
tagline: Launch your SaaS without a marketer, powered by AI. Make GTM
description: TRYGO helps solo founders launch SaaS and digital products without a marketer. It guides you through research, validation, and GTM planning with AI â€“ so you can move from idea to market-ready plan faster, smarter, and with confidence.

name: Shazi VideoGen Ai
tagline: Long-form video generator for faceless YouTube channels.
description: Meet SHAZI â€“ The ULTIMATE Long-Form Video Generator for Faceless YouTube Channels! Built to save time, boost workflow, and grow channels like never before.

name: Circular Resale
tagline: The operating system for resale, powered by AI
description: Circular is an AI-powered inventory management software for resale. Circular enable brands and resellers to start and grow their resale business. In-store and online. Resale should be easy, efficient and profitable. We're here to fix that!

name: Neurolens by Gabify
tagline: Detect early. Act faster. Empower every child
description: Neurolens by Gabify is an AI-powered tool that helps parents and clinicians screen for early signs of speech and neurodevelopmental disordersâ€”like Autismâ€”through a simple video or voice upload. Fast, accessible, and clinically validated.
